The best way for us to truly honor her memory is to make sure that, every day, we continue that struggle.
Heather sacrificed her life in the fight for social and racial justice. She will not be forgotten.
Our condolences go out to the family of Heather Heyer who was killed by a terrorist as she protested Neo-Nazism and white supremacy.
RIP Lt. H. Jay Cullen and Trooper-Pilot Berke M.M. Bates who lost their lives in a helicopter crash in Charlottesville yesterday. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DHIiNHlUwAAE2uV.jpg
It’s 2017 and we’re at an inflection point. Now is the time to look in the mirror and ask ourselves what kind of nation we want to be.
